headline: Does Sports Venue Wins And Board Changes Shift The Bull Case For Evolv Technologies (EVLV)?
summary: Evolv Technologies Holdings, Inc. recently added Henrik Kühl, a seasoned corporate development executive from Axon, to its Board and Audit Committee, while venture investor Bilal Zuberi resigned to pursue other opportunities, and the company expanded deployments of its Evolv Express systems across high-profile sports venues such as UNC’s athletic facilities and TQL Stadium. These venue-wide installations and “Official Fan Screening Partner” designations with major collegiate and professional...

headline: Axon Enterprise Inc (AXON)’s Expanding Role in Digital Infrastructure and Law Enforcement
summary: Axon Enterprise Inc (NASDAQ:AXON) is among the best S&P 500 stocks with highest upside potential. On February 11, Piper Sandler released its latest rankings of top digital infrastructure and connectivity software companies. Among the five standouts, Axon Enterprise Inc (NASDAQ:AXON) ranked third thanks to its strong position in public safety with TASERs and body cameras. […]
